Articles.Content:
I've been a huge fan of KSP for a while, and within the past months, I've been working on a Lego CUUSOO project to turn the bravest of kerbonauts and their vessels, into real life brick form! For more information on the project, email me at [email protected], check out the project itself at http://lego.cuusoo.com/ideas/view/48264 , or even post in here! The project is nowhere near to being complete, and I'm hoping that the community itself might be able to help! I mean, who DOESN'T want to see Jebediah in a miniature Lego set? Right? Right.....? I'm so lonely......

Javascript is disabled. View full album

This guy:

http://lego.cuusoo.com/ideas/view/47794

Is also doing a Kerbal Lego Project.
